what it does is it actually copies down

if we go translate user input into

we go back to the playground if we

the
fact the other thing that I get when I

and this documentation uh looks at a few
different end points that we expose so
an invoke endpoint which takes in one
argument returns one argument batch
which takes in a list list of arguments
returns a list of outputs and then
stream and stream log which stream back
a response and then also stream back the
intermediate steps and so you don't have
to use the playground that we created
this is just a nice little playground
intended for internal development and
maybe to show to internal team members
but if you want to create your own
playground you can use these production

playground or that UI in
